description: This file is a JavaScript source file defining a UI component named 'NotesHome' using the LightningJS framework. It manages the layout, state, and interactions for a notes application main page, including importing components, services, and themes.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders the main page of a notes application, managing layout, state, and user interactions.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Updates the selected note ID when a note is selected from the notes list.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with a default title and updates the selected ID.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Handles hover enter event on the 'New' button, changing its color effect.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Handles hover leave event on the 'New' button, resetting its color effect.
